browser.label: Used Browser
browser.tooltip: Browser driver to use. Chrome/Firefox needs to be installed, PhantomJS can work standalone, but less stable.

cooldown_botcheck.label: Delay between bot checks.
cooldown_botcheck.tooltip: Set the delay between bot checks.

cooldown_update.label: Delay between botlist updates, if automatic
cooldown_update.tooltip: Set the delay between botlist updates.

automatic_update.label: Automatic Botlist update
automatic_update.tooltip: Activate to automatically update the botlist.

safe_mode.label: Safe mode, doesn't ban by itself
safe_mode.tooltip: To make sure your own bot is not banned or just to make sure.

write_message.label: Write a message when a bot is spotted.

allowlist.label: Allowed bots, separated by ', '
allowlist.tooltip: List of allowed bots. The names are separated by ', ' (That is a comma and a space).

pipinstall.label: Install selenium
pipinstall.tooltip: Install the package installer and use it to install selenium. NOTE: This launches terminals. If it does not, check the debug pane.

selfcheck.label: Self check
selfcheck.tooltip: Check if everything is set up correctly, write that to the log.

open_templates.label: Open Message Templates
open_templates.tooltip: Open and edit the message templates.

open_explorer.label: Open Script Folder
open_explorer.tooltip: Open the script folder in Windows explorer. Here, the webdrivers need to be saved and also the file of Comments resides.
